name: VR Furballs - Demolition
description: Grab your slingshot, grab a Furball... AND DEMOLISH THEM ALL!!! In this challenging VR physics-based demolition puzzle game, you will have to toss, sling, smash, slam, shoot, and even headbutt adorable Furballs into their evil foes and their crazy constructions to demolish them all!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 650 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
